Collection of Works of Kim Il Sung Published in Russia 
    Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A collection of famous works concerning national reunification of President Kim Il Sung "On the Proposal for Founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo," was recently published by "Yedinstvo" Corporation of Russia.

S. Korean Delegation Here
    Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A Pusan city delegation led by Mayor An Sang Yong arrived here today at the invitation of the National Reconciliation Council.
 It was met at the airport with compatriotic feelings by Jo Chung Han, vice-chairman of the council, Kim Chun Gun, secretary general of the National Economic Cooperation Federation, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves
S. Korean Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves
    Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The north side's delegation led by Pak Chang Ryon, first vice-chairman of the State Planning Commission who is north side's chairman of the North-South Committee for the Promotion of Economic 
Cooperation, left here today to participate in the sixth meeting of the committee to be held in Seoul.    
 It was seen off at the airport by Ro Tu Chol, vice-chairman of the State Planning Commission, Kim Ryong Gang, vice-minister of Railways, Jong Un Op, chairman of the National Economic Cooperation Federation, and officials concerned.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation to Six-way Talks Leaves for Beijing
articles.content:
S. Korean Delegation Leaves
    Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The south side's delegation led by Kang Man Gil, president of Sangji University, left here today after participating in the north-south seminar on correctly spelling the English name of the country 
 The delegation was seen off at the airport by Mun Yong Ho, director of the Linguistic Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, and officials concerned.
